availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, policeman. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Owens in Fulton County, Kentucky, on April 8, 1862. Policeman in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Policeman in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 6, p. 372.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 10, p. 361A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Fulton County Marriages, Film 000819615.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Louisville County, KY, June 1863.
"Thomas G. Antle (1832-1878)," Find A Grave, Memorial 10595986, accessed December 1, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/10595986.
